relevant_findings.general: Pale male, no acute distress, breathing comfortably on room air
relevant_findings.cardiac: Regular rate and rhythm, S1S2 normal, no JVD
relevant_findings.abdomen: Positive bowel sounds, soft, tender to palpation at epigastrum, no tenderness over transplant site in right lower quadrant, nondistended
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, 2+ dorsalis pedis pulses, 1+ left lower extremity edema, 2+ right lower extremity edema
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented x3, moves all extremities

relevant_findings.ultrasound: The transplanted kidney in the right lower quadrant measures 11.7 cm with stable mild hydronephrosis. There is a small amount of perinephric fluid; however, there is also ascites in all four quadrants. Thickening of the bladder wall is unchanged.
relevant_findings.doppler examination: Normal arterial and venous waveforms in the main renal artery and vein. Resistive indices within the upper, mid and lower poles are 0.78, 0.83 and 0.79 respectively, which are elevated compared to the prior exam.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Resistive indices increased compared to the prior exam.
